title: Children of Hong Kong
creator_credit: Gibson Film Productions, Dave Gibson and Yvonne MacKay
brief_description: Looks at the life of a young boy Ying Kit, and his extended family in Hong Kong. The family live in a houseboat and the program looks at various aspects of his life such as school, family relationships, chores and food.
creator_credit_for_label: Gibson Film Productions, Dave Gibson and Yvonne MacKay
